Welcome to Luminosity. Here you will be task with navigating through a series of mazes with layout that changes dynamically according to the light level perceived by your phone\'s light sensor. You can only vertical and horizontally one tile at a time by clicking on the tile. You can only move to tiles that are colored GREEN, and your objective is to the to the RED tile. Good Luck
\n\nPLAY IN AN AREA WITH GOOD LIGHTING, OR HAVE A LIGHT SOURCE NEARBY. YOU CAN MANIPULATE THE LIGHT INTENSITY DETECTED BY YOUR LIGHT SENSOR BY BLOCKING THE LIGHT SENSOR WITH YOUR FINGER.
